meanings.sent1: The couple was osculating under the mistletoe.
meanings.sent2: She saw her parents osculating in the park.
meanings.sent3: The movie scene had the characters osculating in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: The waves were osculating the shore gently.
meanings.sent5: The puppy was osculating its favorite toy with affection.

meanings.definition: To touch or intersect at a point.
meanings.sent1: The two lines were osculating at the meeting point.
meanings.sent2: His fingers were osculating the edge of the table.
meanings.sent3: The cat was osculating the top of the tree in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The sun was osculating the horizon as it set.
meanings.sent5: The wheels of the bicycle were osculating the ground smoothly.
